OOC: Besides, I DID say "localized", by which I meant the radius is 
only big enough to affect one bot - unless two bots are smack up 
against one another.  However, I will admit that I was a bit over the 
top where the number of shells were concerned, and I'll try to stick 
to one pair per post from now on.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Don't bother yapping about it.  I've already gotten my entire 
> arsenal (Wheeljack-X, Phoenix, and the Rogues) approved by Rauq.  I 
> will point out that the magneto-shells don't cause any physical 
> damage; they're meant to buy time, not win battles.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > It does but I've been wanting to change it ... umm ... it's up to 
> you how you 
> > deal with it.  I need to discuss it though... (damn democratic 
> system) I say 
> > the attack stands, unless rAuq and Azure over rule me.
